about_the_game:
Experience the atmosphere of the world Furriend with the Furriend Original Soundtrack Vol.1

All of the soundtrack of Furriend is especially brought to you by Shireishi Sound, composed by our dearest friend, JYU [XTZY], from EUCXTAZY MUSIC, with love to you our beloved friends.

Features:

  • 18 beautiful and soothing songs

  • Available in lossless format of WAV
